topic_metadata.title: How to place a symbol under or over another symbol in an equation?

posts.name: Nhan
posts.cooked: I want to place d in D under max like in the picture
posts.raw:
![image|362x96](upload://jznABWzl0ftAu30OSDcVwGRwb8u.png)
 I want to place `d in D` under `max` like in the picture

posts.name: Pascal Quach
posts.cooked:
Hello @nhanncv! Don’t hesitate to take a look at the maths documentation at Math – Typst Documentation.

Are you having a particular issue? It would help if you share your current code.

I can reproduce your picture below

$
max_(d in D) min_(s in S(d)) f(d, s)
$
posts.raw:
Hello @nhanncv! Don't hesitate to take a look at the maths documentation at https://typst.app/docs/reference/math/.

Are you having a particular issue? It would help if you share your current code.

I can reproduce your picture below
```typ
$
max_(d in D) min_(s in S(d)) f(d, s)
$
```
